description.en: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Uma Coruja Inteligente que segue você e pega os itens que caírem no chão.
description.cns: 伶俐的猫头鹰跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Weise Eule, welche dir überall hin folgt und deine Items einsammelt.
description.fi: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un maître hibou qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Smart Owl yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: ジェントルアウルを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 영리한 부엉이를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Мудрая сова, которая послушно летает за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Búho Inteligente que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Smart Owl that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: Smart Owlซึ่งตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ หยิบสิ่งของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除伶俐的貓頭鷹. 召喚時,將會自動撿取週邊的道具.
description.vi: Cú thông minh đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
